front.title: Snapshot of E.164 Work - An Unofficial View

abstract.t: This is an unofficial snapshot of some E.164 work. It includes someinformation on E.164-series ITU-T Recommendations, 'country code'assignments, and future pending decisions, meetings, and work.E.164 is an ITU-T Recommendation on international numbering forpublic telecommunication. All views expressed in this InternetDraft are unofficial and are not intended to represent those of anyorganization, corporation, or Administration. This Internet-Draft is an independent submission to the Telephone Number Mapping (enum) working group. Comments should be sent to the author.
